feed.title: Leon’s Blog(n)
feed.subtitle: Just some math notes, piano recordings, and animations

entry.title: Went Buskin!
entry.content:
Went busking! I tried to play as loud as possible, it’d be funny if I got fined.

Learning more jazz as well

Rotoscoping a new fencing video (world class fencers, not me)
entry.summary: Went busking! I tried to play as loud as possible, it’d be funny if I got fined. Learning more jazz as well Rotoscoping a new fencing video (world class fencers, not me)

entry.title: FixedRollerBlades!
entry.content:
Fixed Rollerblades! It’s nice that there is a rollerblading rink just outside my apartment.

Learning more of the manim library, it’s getting more and more inutitive!
entry.summary: Fixed Rollerblades! It’s nice that there is a rollerblading rink just outside my apartment. Learning more of the manim library, it’s getting more and more inutitive!

entry.title: Two Months Into Work
entry.content:
Learning the basics of manim for 3B1B contest video I am making.

Last weekend I went to see Joe Hisashi perform with the Toronto Symphony Orchestra, super hype! Also went mountain biking, learned kpop, and jammed with friends
entry.summary: Learning the basics of manim for 3B1B contest video I am making. Last weekend I went to see Joe Hisashi perform with the Toronto Symphony Orchestra, super hype! Also went mountain biking, learned kpop, and jammed with friends

entry.title: Starting Contest Entry
entry.content:
Planning to enter the 3Blue1Brown summer of math contest. I plan to work with Professor Ian Anthony to make a video explaining finite difference methods for eletric fields. He researches really cool stuff!

Trying to learn the charmer dance, but it’s super fast.
entry.summary: Planning to enter the 3Blue1Brown summer of math contest. I plan to work with Professor Ian Anthony to make a video explaining finite difference methods for eletric fields. He researches really cool stuff! Trying to learn the charmer dance, but it’s super fast.

entry.title: Scavenger Hunt!
entry.content:
Went on a scavenger hunt with friends last weekend.

We came up with fun random tasks for each team to do, such as climbing a tree or taking a picture of the team in the air.

The funniest one was asking a stranger where the CN Tower while it was in view xD.

Also biked 4 hours to mississauga to see someone’s piano, might buy it for my apartment.
entry.summary: Went on a scavenger hunt with friends last weekend. We came up with fun random tasks for each team to do, such as climbing a tree or taking a picture of the team in the air. The funniest one was asking a stranger where the CN Tower while it was in view xD. Also biked 4 hours to mississauga to see someone’s piano, might buy it for my apartment.

entry.title: 3 Weeks in!
entry.content:
Work is cool! Been learning a lot about poisson blending for images.

Went to the National Fencing Tournament last weekend. Didn’t do so well, but had a lot of fun!

Also trying to learn the slim shady solo by Oli Parker, whose name really should be Oil Parker because he’s so slick.
entry.summary: Work is cool! Been learning a lot about poisson blending for images. Went to the National Fencing Tournament last weekend. Didn’t do so well, but had a lot of fun! Also trying to learn the slim shady solo by Oli Parker, whose name really should be Oil Parker because he’s so slick.

entry.title: Started Internship!
entry.content:
Started my internship at Ecopia! Everybody is super nice and the work is super interesting.

Tried the beginning of the trumpet part of gordon goodwin’s Backrow Politics on alto, very fun!

Trying to learn "Love me right" by Exo, but it’s extremely fast.
entry.summary: Started my internship at Ecopia! Everybody is super nice and the work is super interesting. Tried the beginning of the trumpet part of gordon goodwin’s Backrow Politics on alto, very fun! Trying to learn "Love me right" by Exo, but it’s extremely fast.

entry.title: Going home tomorrow!
entry.content:
I should add a script to unmute on fullscreen in the animations section! Also need a script to kill local runs of this blog. Also should sort videos by date in sports section

Trying to learn the rainbow flick, but it’s hard to keep it in the air after it goes over my head.

Also learned some swing dancing yesterday! I am very not used to dancing 6/8 moves in 4/4 time.
entry.summary: I should add a script to unmute on fullscreen in the animations section! Also need a script to kill local runs of this blog. Also should sort videos by date in sports section Trying to learn the rainbow flick, but it’s hard to keep it in the air after it goes over my head. Also learned some swing dancing yesterday! I am very not used to dancing 6/8 moves in 4/4 time.

entry.title: Going home in a week!
entry.content:
Competed at the Ontario University Atheltic’s Fencing competition last weekend!

Did okish. First time competing in Sabre! Was pretty interesting to learn on the fly.

Had my PDES final today (was very hard). Have a couple projects and another final left!
entry.summary: Competed at the Ontario University Atheltic’s Fencing competition last weekend! Did okish. First time competing in Sabre! Was pretty interesting to learn on the fly. Had my PDES final today (was very hard). Have a couple projects and another final left!

entry.title: Terms almost over
entry.content:
Animated a bit today.

Also trying to get jupyter notebook to work on heroku.
